law.text: A separate fund shall be maintained by the county treasurer to be known as the county forest fire protection fund. The assessments collected from each timberland owner, together with penalties, shall constitute the fund and it shall be used only for making payments to the cabinet in accordance with provisions of KRS 149.540.
law.history: Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. III, sec. 13(3). -- Created 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 139, sec. 9, effective June 19, 1958.
